name: Notion Design Content OS (free version)
description: LinkedIn is the best place for designers to: Grow a network & establish expertise – LinkedIn has 1B+ users with 134M+ daily active users and less than 2% share content. Attract & connect with design talent – LinkedIn has 61M+ weekly job searchers, and 40% of global workers say they might leave their jobs. Get inbound leads & sell expertise – LinkedIn has 65M+ decision-makers and is the #1 B2B lead-gen platform, with 40% of B2B marketers saying it's the best channel for driving high-q
features: Grow a network & establish expertise –LinkedIn has 1B+ users with 134M+ daily active users and less than 2% share content.; Attract & connect with design talent –LinkedIn has 61M+ weekly job searchers, and 40% of global workers say they might leave their jobs.; Get inbound leads & sell expertise –LinkedIn has 65M+ decision-makers and is the #1 B2B lead-gen platform, with 40% of B2B marketers saying it's the best channel for driving high-quality leads.; Captureshort notes about your thoughts, observations, stories & takeaways in your Captured notes and audience in your Audience insights; Collectcontent you love (articles, posts, videos, books, etc.) in your Content Collection; Curateyour captured & collected content or audience insights for ideas to create content about.; Createcontent by picking an idea, writing a catchy hook, (over)delivering on this hook & prompting people to take action.; Edityour content by aligning your topic, delivering on the hook, correcting grammar, making it understandable, shortening it, and showing proof.; Share(or use Buffer to schedule) your content on LinkedIn between 3 and 5 PM (GMT+1).; Reviewwhat you shared by reflecting on your post-performance, spotting patterns of what works & categorizing them under performance.
